block.name: And Const
block.doc: Implements the function out = in AND const. This can be useful to mask certain bits in a byte (force them to zero).

param.name: IO Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the input and output.

option.name: Int
option.doc: Sets the input and output to integer (signed, 32-bit) values.

option.name: Short
option.doc: Sets the input and output to short (signed, 16-bit) values.

option.name: Byte
option.doc: Sets the input and output to byte (unsigned, 8-bit) values.

param.name: Constant
param.doc: Sets the constant value that will be used as the and-mask.
